Name: fallax
Habitat: prefers sunexposed Forestedges, singletrees also in Beehives
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: herculeanus
Habitat: prefers mixed woodland with a part of spruces also  in xeric and halfxeric grassland partly with shrubs
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: ligniperdus
Habitat: prefers mixed woodland with a high part of spruces, also in xeric- and halfxeric grassland
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: femoratus
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: spinolae
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: aethiops
Habitat: high Xerothermic in dry grassland and on Lime stone
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos

Name: arboreus
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos, small crickets

Name: arnoldinus
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos, small crickets

Name: atriceps
Nutrition: Honeywater and insects e.g. Dipterans like Flies or Mosquitos, small crickets

Name: barbaricus
Habitat: prefers open areas avoids aride areas
